name: Indian-Style Grilled Tuna Steaks with Aromatic Spice Paste
ingredients: 10 saffron threads, soaked in 2 teaspoons water for 30 minutes
instructions: Trim away pieces of skin or bones, refrigerate
Combine all other ingredients in a blender and puree to a smooth paste.  Add salt to taste.  Spread over both sides of the tuna and marinate for 30 minutes

Transfer gently to a preheated grill.  Grill the tuna on both sides 1 to 2 inches above a bed of very hot coals.  Tuna should be cooked only three minutes per side so that it remains rare in the middle.  Other fish steaks should be cooked throughout, about 8 minutes per inch total cooking time.  Serve immediately
